author: cnbc.com
title: Bemis Company Declares Regular Quarterly Dividend
text:
NEENAH, Wis.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- The Board of Directors of Bemis Company, Inc. (NYSE: BMS) has declared a regular quarterly cash dividend of 31 cents per share. The dividend is payable June 1, 2018, to shareholders of record at the close of business on May 17, 2018. Bemis has paid an annual dividend on its common stock since 1922. Bemis has been included in Standard & Poor's list of Dividend Aristocrats since 2008.
ABOUT BEMIS COMPANY, INC.
Bemis Company, Inc. (“Bemis” or the “Company”) is a major supplier of flexible and rigid plastic packaging used by leading food, consumer products, healthcare, and other companies worldwide. Founded in 1858, Bemis reported 2017 net sales from continuing operations of $4.0 billion. Bemis has a strong technical base in polymer chemistry, film extrusion, coating and laminating, printing, and converting. Headquartered in Neenah, Wisconsin, Bemis employs approximately 16,000 individuals worldwide. More information about Bemis is available at our website, www.bemis.com .
